name: wordpress-query-reference
description: A dead simple WP Query reference.
author: CJ Patoilo <cjpatoilo@gmail.com>

scripts.prepush: marshmallow -o docs -i artwork.psd -t 'WordPress Query Reference' -f -m && inject-ga docs/index.html -o docs/index.html -c 'UA-24389952-13' && boeing docs && rimraf docs
scripts.test: nyc ava && eslint . -c styled --ignore-path .gitignore && editorconfig-tools check .
